R

RectifiedGrid - Class in org.uncertweb.api.gml.geometry
Rectified Grid of UncertWeb GML profile; extends JTS geometry; A RectifiedGrid is a grid for which there is an affine transformation between the grid coordinates and the coordinates of an external coordinate reference system.
RectifiedGrid(Envelope, List<String>, Point, Collection<Point>, GeometryFactory) - Constructor for class org.uncertweb.api.gml.geometry.RectifiedGrid
constructor
